column5: OverviewThe Application Period for 2024-25 intake is 13th November 2023 – 6th June 2024. Apply Now!  The Master degree program in Computer Engineering provides high level education to graduate students with a bachelor in computer technology or scientific disciplines. The syllabus focuses on applied mathematics, economics, management. Three different curricula are available. Computer Science and Multimedia curriculum includes Multiprocessor Architectures, Computer Networks, Performance Evaluation, Multimedia Systems and Technologies, Computer Vision and Human Computer Interaction.
column7: - EU and non-EU students regularly residing in Italy: 156 - 4000 euro per year, determined by students’ family income. - Non-Eu students with a valid study VISA: flat rate, set on the basis of the Country of citizenship and the field of study. The flat rate ranges from 400 EUR to 4500 EUR per year.
